characters.name: Cipher
characters.description: A rogue hacker with a neural shunt.

characters.name: The Architect
characters.description: An AI construct controlling the city grid.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Wakeup
chapters.content:
The neon rain fell hard on the pavement. {CHAR_0:The hacker} adjusted his collar. He was waiting for {CHAR_2:the kid}. 'Where is the data?' asked {CHAR_0}.

{CHAR_2} laughed. 'You think {CHAR_1:The Architect} lets anything slip?'

chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Grid
chapters.content: {CHAR_0} connected to the mainframe. The presence of {CHAR_1:the machine god} was overwhelming. 'I see you,' the voice boomed. {CHAR_0:Cipher} tried to disconnect, but {CHAR_1} held the line.

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Broken Memories
chapters.content: {CHAR_0} visited {CHAR_3:the memory broker}. 'I need to remember,' said {CHAR_0}. {CHAR_3} handed over a drive. 'This contains files on {CHAR_1}.'

chapters.title: Chapter 4: The Void Bar
chapters.content: {CHAR_4} was cleaning a glass. {CHAR_0:The exhausted runner} sat at the bar, looking defeated. 'Drink?' asked {CHAR_4}. 'Make it strong,' replied {CHAR_0}. {CHAR_2} slid a cred-chip across the counter.

chapters.title: Chapter 5: Confrontation
chapters.content: The final showdown. {CHAR_0} vs {CHAR_1}. {CHAR_2} watched from the shadows. {CHAR_0} unleashed the virus. {CHAR_1} screamed in binary.
